Flow.description: What: Capture Requested Date and Cart Details Who: Franck When: March 2023.

formulas.name: shippingRequestDateTime
formulas.expression: DATETIMEVALUE( {!shippingRequestDateText} + " " + RIGHT( TEXT( {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime} ), LEN( TEXT( {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime} )) - FIND( " " , TEXT( {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime} ))))

Flow.label: B2B Checkout One Screen
